extendedInfo.description: Stunning effects! Explosive graphics! The most shining tower defense game on Android.Features:* Stunning Graphics, Particle Effects and Animations & Fast, Arcade Action.* 16 types of towers, 15 types of enemies, infinite combinations!* 6 super maps with the designed maze.* Auto-saves Game when interrupted.* 10 difficulty levels, armory, ect.* Easy to Play, Very Tough to Master!* OpenFeint supported.------------------------------Try other awesome games by Cat Studio------------------------------"Egypt Zuma - Temple of Anubis" - A Zuma game with egypt theme."Little Commander - World War II TD" - A TD game with very cute visual style."Soldiers of Glory : World War 2" - Act as the Allied commander and win the WWII!"Soldiers of Glory : Modern War" - A TD game that enemies could attack you back!"Epic Defense - the Elements" - A TD game with war3 visual style."Epic Defense 2 - Wind Spells" - the second work of Epic Defense series, more new elements! more new towers!"Galaxy Wars Defense" - A Space Sci-Fi TD with Stunning Graphics and Super Big Maps!"Zerg Must Die" - A TD game with SC2 style. The gameplay very like Defense Grid"Marble Blast - Zodiac" - Another very good Zuma Game, and you can draw your custom levels!"Global Defense: Zombie War" - Do you like killing zombies? Fans of World War Z will like this defense game! ------------------------------Cat Studio's Facebook Page: https://www.facebook.com/CatStudioGamesCat Studio's Tiwtter: https://twitter.com/CatStudio_GamesCat Studio's Youtube Channel: https://youtube.com/CatStudioGames------------------------------

reviews.title: Constant crashes...
reviews.comment: This is such a good game, but I crash when opening it 3 out of 4 times. Please fix.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Hooked!
reviews.comment: Game play and graphics are great! I wish they would add a settings menu and volume control option though...or at least a mute button.
reviews.author: Mhiko Alba

reviews.title: So addicting
reviews.comment: Though i cant seem to kill the round blue guys very well... still very fun on my tablet and my phone!!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Need help.
reviews.comment: Have never been able to use any but the first towers of each color. No idea how to unlock them. Fun game but need to know how to open new towers. Only can open first power up tower also.
reviews.author: Dan Hughes

reviews.title: Worked once now crashes everytime
reviews.comment: So I had this game on my evo shift now on my evo 4g LTE, it crashes everytime I open it and it only worked once. So when it did work the first time it was a fun and challenging game, but can get monotonous towards the end.
reviews.author: Chris Haugen

reviews.title: Nice game.  But could use some improvements.
reviews.comment: its a nice game.  Reminds me of the flash game \"laser defense\".  A couple of suggestions: Make the \"upgrade indicator number\" color configurable.  Im part colorblind in the sense that i cant tell like colors apart.  For example, blue from purple or yellow from green.  I think it would be easier to read if i could change the color of the upgrade indicator.  Also, might be nice if there was a x/100 waves indicator to tell which wave im on.  For access to other towers, select a different level layout.
reviews.author: Alexander Cory

reviews.title: Its fun.
reviews.comment: Good game. No issuee.
reviews.author: Sergio Hernandez

reviews.title: Very fun.  Difficult game
reviews.comment: I like it, Passes time nicely.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: 1 major flaw
reviews.comment: Why can\'t I turn off the music? When I do play this game I\'m always listening to my own music and it\'s being drowned out by the sound effects and game music. Please fix.
reviews.author: Jon Sterling

reviews.title: fun
reviews.comment: Use the purple to get the blue guys. This is a good fun game.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Best game in a looooong time
reviews.comment: Love this retrostyle game

reviews.title: Super fun
reviews.comment: I love this game! Good challenge but not too difficult!

reviews.comment: Excellent game! A must! More levels needed though.

reviews.comment: Needs some work to correct menus and other bugs, but overall an enjoyable game.  Please keep the updates coming!
